edu.mines.jtk.mesh

Class TetMesh.NodeList

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mines.jtk.mesh.TetMesh.NodeList
  • Enclosing class:
    TetMesh

    public static class TetMesh.NodeList
extends java.lang.Object
    A dynamically growing list of nodes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      TetMesh.NodeList() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(TetMesh.Node node)
      Appends the specified node to this list.
      void clear()
      Removes all nodes from this list.
      int nnode()
      Returns the number of nodes in this list.
      TetMesh.Node[] nodes()
      Returns (by reference) the array of nodes in this list.
      TetMesh.Node remove(int index)
      Removes the node with specified index from this list.
      TetMesh.Node[] trim()
      Trims this list so that its array length equals the number of nodes.
